Rolie-Poly Blend equation¶

Summary¶

class TheoryBlendRoliePoly.TheoryBlendRoliePoly[source]¶

Rolie-Poly * Function

\[\boldsymbol \sigma = G_N^0 \sum_i \phi_i \text{fene}(\lambda_i) \boldsymbol A_i\]

where .. math:

\boldsymbol A_i &= \sum_j \phi_j \boldsymbol A_{ij}\\
\lambda_i &= \left( \dfrac{\text{Tr A_i}}{3}  \right)^{1/2}\            \stackrel{\nabla}{\boldsymbol A_{ij}} = \dfrac{1}{\tau_{\mathrm d,i}} (\boldsymbol A_{ij} - \boldsymbol I)
  • Parameters
    • \(n_{modes}\): number of Maxwell modes equally distributed in logarithmic scale between \(\omega_{min}\) and \(\omega_{max}\).
    • logwmin = \(\log(\omega_{min})\): decimal logarithm of the minimum frequency.
    • logwmax = \(\log(\omega_{max})\): decimal logarithm of the maximum frequency.
    • logGi = \(\log(G_{i})\): decimal logarithm of the amplitude of Maxwell mode \(i\).
